wm-license-cc-by-sa-3.0-text: Muaba wa malubu udiku mu miaku ya licence[[{{int:wm-license-cc-wiki-link}}|Creative Commons]] [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.fr Attribution – Partage dans les Mêmes Conditions 3.0 (non transposée)].
wm-license-cc-free-to-share-text: bua kupatula, kuabanya ne kufila mudimu
wm-license-cc-conditions-attribution-tex: Udi ne bua kufila mukanda wa dianyisha udi mukumbane, kufila diumvuija dia mukanda wa difila mikanda ne kufila diumanyisha dia bikalabu bashintulule mukanda. Udi mua kuenza nunku mu mushindu kayi wonso udi umueneka muimpe, kadi ki mbualu budi buleja ne: udi ukuanyisha anyi udi ukuanyisha bua kuenza mudimu ne mikanda eyi to.
wm-license-cc-conditions-share_alike-tex: une wewa mu tshintulula, anyi mukudimina anyi mu tua mushinga aa tshintu,udi mua kuabanya diambuluisha dieba pa[[ccorg:share-your-work/licensing-considerations/compatible-licenses|license identique ou compatible]] à celle de l’original.
